name: Dan Borthwick
body:
Hello, and welcome to my site. I am a freelance Technology Consultant and Game Developer based in Melbourne, Australia.

### Agency and Consulting
I have held several roles with digital agencies, including Technical Director of innovative game design agency [Hide&Seek](http://hideandseek.net) and freelance TD roles at [Nerv](https://convertagency.com/) and [Pleo](https://www.crunchbase.com/organization/pleo-2#/entity). 

Most recently I've been working with [FutureGov](http://www.wearefuturegov.com/), bringing digital and design thinking to public services.

### Game Development
Over a decade of experience in the games industry with senior management positions at a number of notable studios, including Technical Director of [King](http://company.king.com/)'s London studio, founding a new London studio for [NaturalMotion](http://www.naturalmotion.com/company) and was one of the original developers at Facebook gaming startup [Playfish](https://techcrunch.com/2009/11/09/not-playing-around-electronic-arts-buys-playfish-for-275-million/), later acquired by Electronic Arts.

I can sometimes be found exploring new game projects at [The Arcade](http://thearcade.melbourne/). 

### Contact
e: <mailto:dan@smartcasual.cc>

p: +61 416 637307

[LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/danborthwick)
